fullName: Arrays: Verify that user receives error for invalid python code for Basic Operations in Lists page

name: Verify that user receives error for invalid python code for Basic Operations in Lists page

steps.name: Given  The user is logged into the DS Algo Portal with valid credentials
When  The user clicks the Get Started button in Array Panel
Then  The user should be navigated to the Array page
Given  The user is on tryeditor page of Basic Operations in Lists page
When  The user clicks Run button with invalid code from sheetname "tryEditorCode" and row 1 for Basic Operations in Lists page
Then  The user should be able to see an error message in alert window
